_comment: Engine Subsystems Configuration - Controls which subsystems are initialized during engine startup

_usage.core_subsystems: Remove subsystem name from 'core.subsystems' array to disable it
_usage.optional_subsystems: Set 'enabled: false' in subsystem config to disable it
_usage.defaults: If this file is missing or malformed, all subsystems default to enabled

audio.description: Audio subsystem using FMOD for sound playback and 3D audio

input.description: Input subsystem for keyboard, mouse, and gamepad input handling

script.description: Script subsystem using V8 JavaScript engine for dual-language game logic

network.description: Network subsystem for multiplayer and network communication (not yet implemented)

core.description: Core subsystems - Remove from array to disable. Warning: Disabling core subsystems may cause crashes if dependent systems are enabled.

dependencies.DevConsole: Requires Renderer - Can be safely disabled
